workflow.name: PBS Synchronize All Tasks
workflow.executionLabelExpression: PBS Synchronize All Tasks | Collaborate Configured? ${!collabNotConfigured}

queryStep.name: check if workflow is running
queryStep.criteria: <criteria> <and> <condition property="workflowVersion.workflow.key" op="eq"> <test value="${ #this.workflow.workflowVersion.workflow.key }" /> </condition> <condition property="uuid" op="noteq"> <test value="${ #this.workflow.uuid }" /> </condition> <condition property="status" op="in"> <tests> <test value="CREATED" /> <test value="QUEUED" /> <test value="EXECUTING" /> </tests> </condition> </and> </criteria>

testStep.name: collaborate config log
testStep.executionLabelExpression: check log for collaborate configuration details

queryStep.name: query for running subflows
queryStep.executionLabelExpression: checking for workflows (with key = _synchronizeTask) that are not in a finished state
queryStep.criteria: <criteria> <and> <condition property="workflowVersion.workflow.key" op="eq"> <test value="_synchronizeTaskHidden"/> </condition> <condition property="status" op="in"> <tests> <test value="CREATED" /> <test value="QUEUED" /> <test value="EXECUTING" /> </tests> </condition> </and> </criteria>

noopStep.name: check running subflows
noopStep.executionLabelExpression: number of subflows (key = _synchronizeTask) running >>> ${executingSubflows.size()} out of ${queueLimit}

delayStep.name: queue full
delayStep.executionLabelExpression: ${tasks.size()} tasks remaining | Subflows running: ${executingSubflows.size()}/${queueLimit} | Waiting ${queryPollInterval} seconds.

groovyStep.name: remove tasks from main list
groovyStep.executionLabelExpression: remove ${nextTasks.size()} tasks from the main list

executeSubflowStep.name: synchronize tasks
executeSubflowStep.executionLabelExpression: Preparing ${nextTasks.size()} tasks to sync. | ${tasks.size()} tasks remaining | Subflows running: ${executingSubflows.size()}/${queueLimit}

contextDataDef.name: collabNotConfigured
contextDataDef.defaultDataExpression: ${#sysconfig('cloudform.apiKey') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.apiKey') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.analyticsService.url') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.analyticsService.url') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.assetService.url') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.assetService.url') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.deliveryService.url') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.deliveryService.url') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.metadataSearchService.url') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.metadataSearchService.url') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.securityService.url') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.securityService.url') == '' OR #sysconfig('cloudform.scratchImportDirectory') == null OR #sysconfig('cloudform.scratchImportDirectory') == ''}
